cause.description:
come on people, abortion is WRONG!! we all know the scientists say its not murder because the baby is not a living human thing til its born! if that was true than how can u see a heartbeat on the ultrasound monitor, why do u see the baby moving!!! please do it for the babies!! please join me in this cause to stop abortion!! babies are being killed and just thrown in a trash can like they are nothing!! like they are just trash!! please help!
1. ABortion has gotta stop & be made illegal
cause.name: Abortion Should Be Illegal
